entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. A few showers beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow or rain late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
